testcase.classname: Checkout related scenarios like add to cart,remove,payment etc.
testcase.name: Add a single item into cart and then remove it
testcase.system-out: Given User "callnirajgupta@gmail.com" with password "password1" login into the application with correct credentials.passed When user searches for the "Faded Short Sleeve T-shirts"....................passed And user Add To Cart and Proceed to checkout................................passed Then summary section shows the added item...................................passed When user delete the item with sku as "SKU : demo_1"........................passed Then added item should be removed...........................................passed And verify that User successfully log out of the application................passed

testcase.classname: Check login and register related scenarios
testcase.name: login with ExamplesParameters
testcase.system-out: Given User "callnirajgupta@gmail.com" with password "password1" login into the application with correct credentials ExamplesParameters.passed Given User successfully log out of the application after clicking on log out button.passed
